thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: K. Aubrey
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by K. Aubrey

author: K. Aubrey
title: K. Aubrey
text: Overall my experience was good, it did take a call to customer service but they acted very professional and were able to offer me a solution that was acceptable. The original charge was very high but they were able to adjust the total price to one more in line with the local market. The website was easy to use and navigate.
